
                            
                            <p>闲鱼买个了二手机&nbsp;&nbsp;电池不行了&nbsp;&nbsp;我都没要钱&nbsp;&nbsp;他主动退80&nbsp;&nbsp;这样的卖家真是可遇不可求啊 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/10/133143hz2948q0j2dy117d.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/10/133143hz2948q0j2dy117d.jpg"> <br>  <br> </p><p class="pl"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/cheng/em1034.gif" alt="闲鱼还有这样的卖家呢 - 0818团" title="闲鱼还有这样的卖家呢 - 0818团"></p><p></p>
